name: dfs.datanode.ec.reconstruction.threads
description:
Number of threads used by the Datanode for background
    reconstruction work.

name: ha.health-monitor.sleep-after-disconnect.ms
description: How long to sleep after an unexpected RPC error.

name: dfs.datanode.http.internal-proxy.port
description:
The datanode's internal web proxy port.
    By default it selects a random port available in runtime.

name: dfs.namenode.accesstime.precision
description:
The access time for HDFS file is precise upto this value. 
               The default value is 1 hour. Setting a value of 0 disables
               access times for HDFS.

name: dfs.balancer.getBlocks.min-block-size
description:
Minimum block threshold size in bytes to ignore when fetching a source's
    block list.
